citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials for an inspection of the animal facility at
2:15pm on 7/21/2016. The office secretary reported that the licensee was out of town for the afternoon for a class.
Additional Inspectors
Wilken Kevin, Animal Care Inspector

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials for an inspection of the animal facility at
2:15pm on 7/21/2016.  The office secretary reported that the licensee was out of town for the afternoon for a class.
Additional Inspectors
Wilken Kevin, Animal Care Inspector
